channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Kamala Harris Should Have to Answer for Equity
item.description: She’s getting a free ride.

item.title: Trump Seems Intent on Undermining His Tax-Policy Record
item.description: The former president should take his own side in the fight and stop promising to make the tax code more complicated and burdensome than it already is.

item.title: Supreme court races in key states could tip scales on policy questions
item.description: Unlike Georgia and Nevada, battleground states such as Arizona, North Carolina and Michigan will likely see high-stakes state supreme court races.

item.title: Is Democrats’ Anxiety Justified?
item.description: That depends on whom you ask.

item.title: Kamala Harris Is an Idiot
item.description: She’s wildly, catastrophically, incontestably out of her depth.
